oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sustainable recycling of compost products in plant production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tontti, Tiina
Lehtonen, Keijo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the research project "Sustainable recycling of compost products in plant production" we study and verify the effects of the use of biowaste and sewage sludge composts in plant production.
